snippet.title: "There's No Socks" gameplay trailer
snippet.description:
A  charming adventure in our cozy game series, where classic meets modern in a delightful blend of hidden objects, colorful puzzles, and whimsical characters.

 Explore intricate levels filled with surprises like  socks, and more all set in a nostalgic yet fresh cartoon-style 2D world. 

Test your skills with challenging levels, unlock achievements, and unravel the mysteries in this indie gem that brings a touch of retro charm to the point-and-click genre.

Check the game on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2928610/Theres_no_Socks/

Play it for free ! Release is set on 5 June on Steam 

27 june on #nintendoswitch
